item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure File Sync in Israel Central
item.description:
Azure File Sync is now generally available in the Israel Central region. It lets you tier data from on-premises Windows Servers to Azure Files to support hybrid scenarios and simplify migrations while preserving on-premises file server performance, flexibility, and compatibility.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: User delegation SAS for Azure Tables, Azure Files, and Azure Queues
item.description:
Microsoft has announced public preview of User Delegation SAS (user-delegation shared access signatures) for Azure Tables, Azure Files, and Azure Queues, extending support that was previously generally available only for blobs.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Zonal placement for Azure file shares Azure Files Premium LRS in select regions.
item.description:
Zonal Placement for Azure Files Premium LRS is now generally available in select regions, allowing you to pin storage accounts to a specific availability zone for explicit control over zone locality, improved high availability, fault isolation, and more predictable behavior.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure File Sync in New Zealand North
item.description:
Azure File Sync is now generally available in the New Zealand North region, enabling customers to tier data from on-premises Windows Servers to Azure Files for hybrid scenarios and simplified migration while preserving on-premises file server performance and compatibility.

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Entra-only identities support with Azure Files SMB
item.description:
Azure Files now offers Entra-only identities in public preview, providing a cloud-native authentication option for SMB file share access using Microsoft Entra Kerberos so customers can retire on-premises domain controllers.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Vaulted backup for Azure Files (Premium)
item.description:
Azure Backup now offers generally available vaulted backups for Azure Files premium shares, providing vault-based protection to help ensure business continuity and compliance.

  • Source: Azure Updates
